description: A flattened array of all of the existing cards in Flesh and Blood, with with each item being a unique card printing.

pitch.description: The pitch value of the card. Can be a number or blank.

cost.description: The cost of the card. Can be a number, X, XX, X and a number, or blank.

power.description: The power of the card. Can be a number, *, X, or blank.

defense.description: The defense of the card. Can be a number, *, or blank.

health.description: The health of the card. Can be a number or blank.

intelligence.description: The intelligence of the card. Can be a number or blank.

types.description: The types of the card (includes all types, subtypes, etc).

card_keywords.description: The keywords inherent to the card. Includes conditional keywords, but does not include keywords that are part of the card's activated and triggered abilities.

abilities_and_effects.description: The activated abilities and once per turn effects of the cards. Just contains what type of ability it is, not the ability itself. (Ex: Once per Turn Action)

ability_and_effect_keywords.description: The keywords that are part of the card's activated and triggered abilities.

granted_keywords.description: The keywords that the card grants to other objects.

functional_text.description: The functional text of the card, formatted in Markdown.

functional_text_plain.description: The functional text of the card, formatted in plain text.

flavor_text.description: The flavor text of the card, formatted in Markdown.

flavor_text_plain.description: The flavor text of the card, formatted in plain text.

type_text.description: The full type text box of the card.

played_horizontally.description: A boolean representing if the card is played and displayed horizontally.

blitz_legal.description: A boolean representing if the card is legal in Blitz (not including bans or suspensions).

cc_legal.description: A boolean representing if the card is legal in Classic Constructed (not including bans or suspensions).

commoner_legal.description: A boolean representing if the card is legal in Commoner (not including bans or suspensions).

blitz_living_legend.description: A boolean representing if the card is Living Legend in Blitz.

blitz_living_legend_start.description: The date the card became Living Legend in Blitz (will not be present otherwise).

cc_living_legend.description: A boolean representing if the card is Living Legend in Classic Constructed.

cc_living_legend_start.description: The date the card became Living Legend in Classic Constructed (will not be present otherwise).

blitz_banned.description: A boolean representing if the card is currently banned in Blitz.

blitz_banned_start.description: The date the card became banned in Blitz (will not be present otherwise).

cc_banned.description: A boolean representing if the card is currently banned in Classic Constructed.

cc_banned_start.description: The date the card became banned in Classic Constructed (will not be present otherwise).

commoner_banned.description: A boolean representing if the card is currently banned in Commoner.

commoner_banned_start.description: The date the card became banned in Commoner (will not be present otherwise).

upf_banned.description: A boolean representing if the card is currently banned in Ultimate Pit Fight.

upf_banned_start.description: The date the card became banned in Ultimate Pit Fight (will not be present otherwise).

blitz_suspended.description: A boolean representing if the card is currently banned in Blitz.

blitz_suspended_start.description: The date the card became suspended in Blitz (will not be present otherwise).

blitz_suspended_end.description: Represents when the card is set to be unsuspended in Blitz. Contains a displayable text describing when it will be unsuspended if it is currently suspended (will not be present otherwise).

cc_suspended.description: A boolean representing if the card is currently banned in Classic Constructed.

cc_suspended_start.description: The date the card became suspended in Classic Constructed (will not be present otherwise).

cc_suspended_end.description: Represents when the card is set to be unsuspended in Classic Constructed. Contains a displayable text describing when it will be unsuspended if it is currently suspended (will not be present otherwise).

commoner_suspended.description: A boolean representing if the card is currently banned in Commoner.

commoner_suspended_start.description: The date the card became suspended in Commoner (will not be present otherwise).

commoner_suspended_end.description: Represents when the card is set to be unsuspended in Commoner. Contains a displayable text describing when it will be unsuspended if it is currently suspended (will not be present otherwise).

referenced_cards.description: Contains a list of unique IDs representing the various cards referenced by this card.

cards_referenced_by.description: Contains a list of unique IDs representing the various cards that reference this card.

variation_unique_id.description: A UUID representing the printing within this data set.

set_edition_unique_id.description: A UUID representing the set edition the printing belongs to within this data set.

id.description: The ID of the card printing.

set_id.description: The ID of the set the card is printed in.

edition.description: The edition of the set the card is printed in.

foilings.description: The foilings the card printing comes in.

items.description: A shortcode representing an individual foiling.

rarity.description: A shortcode representing the rarity the card printing was printed at.

artist.description: The artist of the card printing.

art_variation.description: A shortcode representing the special art treatment or variation the card was printed with, if any.

image_url.description: An official LSS image URL of the card printing, if it exists.

double_sided_card_info.description: All of the data for the double-sided cards this card printing is a part of.

other_face_unique_id.description: The Unique ID of the card printing that is the other face of this double-sided card.

is_front.description: A boolean representing whether this card printing is the front or back of the double-sided card.

is_DFC.description: A boolean representing whether this double-sided card is a Double Face Card (ex: Invoke Tomeltai / Tomeltai).
